49b5: stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par
49b6: spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par
49b7: bgyi/ 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad med pa rnams
49b8: la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi
50a1: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par
50a2: bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab
50a3: par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/
50a4: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
50a5: la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am/ mi spro ba spros par
50a6: bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang / / / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya brgyad bcu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings
50a7: la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
50a8: nyid kyang gzugs so/ / tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du
50b1: shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dra shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyang chos
50b2: kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
50b3: lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig kyang chos kyi dbyings
50b4: ma lags/ mig las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba las gud na
50b5: yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
50b6: sa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// lce yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce las gad na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
50b7: kya dbyings nyid kyang lce'o/ / lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid kyang ches
50b8: dpengs ma lags/ yid las ga na yang chos kyi dbangs ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las
51a1: gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang chos
51a2: kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri yang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ de las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
51a3: so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ro las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o// reg kyang chos
51a4: kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/ chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos la gud
51a5: na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las
51a6: gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
51a7: lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par
51a8: shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par
51b1: shes pa'o/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
51b2: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam
51b3: par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang
51b4: chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
51b5: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te
51b6: reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus
51b7: te reg pa'o/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
51b8: nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/
52a1: so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
52a2: te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
52a3: gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang
52a4: chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
52a5: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba las
52a6: gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te
52a7: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos
52a8: kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las bud
52b1: nayang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te/
52b2: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang
52b3: chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
52b4: gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
52b5: ba'o/ / sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so//
52b6: chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i kham
52b7: kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyang
52b8: chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rlung gi khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams
53a1: kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i
53a2: khams so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rngam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
53a3: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi
53a4: dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
53a5: dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ / rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
53a6: kye dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ / ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi
53a7: dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched drug las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos
53a8: kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ rog pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
53b1: kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o/ / tsher ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
53b2: tsher ba'o/ / sred pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ srod pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srod pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa yang
53b3: chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ len pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
53b4: lags/ srid pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba las
53b5: gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rga shi las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
53b6: mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sbyidan pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi
53b7: dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
53b8: tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol/
54a1: du phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol
54a2: du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
54a3: byin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bsam gtan
54a4: gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
54a5: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
54a6: ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong
54a7: pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi stong
54a8: pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
54b1: bya nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs
54b2: ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa
54b3: nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong
54b4: pa nyid do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
54b5: kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
54b6: nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
54b7: ma bachis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags// mtha'
54b8: las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//
55a1: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ theg pa dang tha ma med pa stong
55a2: pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na
55a3: yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
55a4: lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams
55a5: cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyi
55a6: nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid
55a7: stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gung na yang chos
55a8: kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
55b1: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//
55b2: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
55b3: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te// dngos po
55b4: med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dran pa
55b5: nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par
55b6: spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
55b7: kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
55b8: nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
56a1: dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
56a2: ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las
56a3: gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
56a4: lam las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'phags
56a5: pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan
56a6: rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/
56a7: tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams
56a8: so/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs med
56b1: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam
56b2: par thar pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang mos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
56b3: 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid//
56b4: kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang chos kyi
56b5: dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
56b6: dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
56b7: mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi
56b8: dbyings ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
57a1: kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi
57a2: sgo rnams so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
57a3: nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang
57a4: chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag pa rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ so
57a5: so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//
57a6: byams pa chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byams pa chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams
57a7: pa chen po'o/ / snying rje chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying
57a8: rje chen po'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
57b1: ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las
57b2: gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings
57b3: ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
57b4: 'bras bu'o/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
57b5: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
57b6: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid
57b7: kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub po// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam gyi
57b8: rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang
58a1: chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
58a2: pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
58a3: kyang tshor ba'o/ / 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis
58a4: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid kyang chos kyi
58a5: dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
58a6: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
58a7: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
58a8: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos rnams so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
58b1: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
58b2: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi
58b3: dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
58b4: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
58b5: dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
58b6: dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
58b7: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
58b8: kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
59a1: rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
59a2: kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / sa'i khabs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
59a3: nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ / me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam
59a4: mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so//
59a5: ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
59a6: kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ / ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang /
59a7: mched drug go/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
59a8: nyid kyang sred pa'o/ / len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
59b1: dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/ / rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
59b2: ba'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du byin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
59b3: nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid
59b4: kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o//
59b5: nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// byi gyod pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos
59b6: kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi
59b7: dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
59b8: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
60a1: so/ / ngos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang zam med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang thab byed pa stong pa nyid do/
60a2: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//
60a3: chos thams cad bde ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// ros k+ShiM dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan
60a4: nyid stong pa nyid do/ / sa dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngas pamed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings
60a5: nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
60a6: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid
60a7: kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi
60a8: dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
60b1: nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ngo 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i
60b2: bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med
60b3: pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms
60b4: par 'jug pa rnams so/ / rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs
60b5: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
60b6: kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams
60b7: so/ / ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshes
60b8: pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// sa
61a1: yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ / chob kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
61a2: byams pa chen po'o/ / snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs
61a3: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
61a4: so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi
61a5: dbyings so/ / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub po// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
61a6: kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor gal te yang
61a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
61a8: gnas par yang mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad chos
61b1: kyi dbyings su shes nas chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te/ 'di ni gzugs shes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du shes zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di ni
61b2: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni mig ces bya'o// 'di ni rna ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni snga zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid ces bya'o// 'di ni gzugs shes bya'o// 'di ni
61b3: sgra zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni dr-i zhes bya'o// 'di ni ro zhes bya'o// 'di ni reg ces bya'o// 'di ni chos shes bya'o// 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i
61b4: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di
61b5: ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di
61b6: ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
61b7: rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sa'i khams shes bya'o// 'di ni chu'i khams
61b8: shes bya'o/ / 'di ni me'i khams shes bya'o// 'di ni rlung gi khams shes bya'o// 'di ni nam mkha'i khams shes bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya'o// 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed/
62a1: ces bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs shes bya'o// 'di ni skye mched drug ces bya'o// 'di ni reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sred pa
62a2: zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni len pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni srid pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rga shi zhes bya'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o//
62a3: 'din bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bsam gau tan gyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o//
62a4: 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'din phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces
62a5: bya'o/ / 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dor ba med
62a6: pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ / 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni
62a7: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ / 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni yang dag
62a8: par spong ba rnams shes bya'o/ / 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni dbang po rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni stobs rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes
62b1: bya'o/ / 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni tshad med pa rnams shes bya'o//
62b2: 'di dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o// 'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par
62b3: thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya'o//
62b4: 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o// 'di ni snying
62b5: rje chen po zhes bya'o/ / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i
62b6: 'bras bu zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang byang chub ces bya'o// 'di na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o zhes ston
62b7: to/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na// sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma byed pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa gyi na zhig la brten te/ gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs sam/
62b8: rta'i gzugs sam/ ba lang gi gzugs sam// rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs sam/ skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags
63a1: tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba mdangs dga' ba'am/ rdzing bu ma dngas dga' ba 'am/ nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul cing / de dag tu stan dang 'khor gyi snyan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna
63a2: tshegs bting ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/ glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byas sam/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba
63a3: 'am/ tshul khrims srung ba'am/ bzod pas bsgrub pa'am/ brtson 'grus bcom pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba 'am/ shes rab bsgom pa 'am/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bar byas
63a4: te/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ bram ze che zhing mthe ba'i rigs bstan tam/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ ri rab bstan tam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
63a5: bstan tam/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ mche ma'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams bstan tam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam
63a6: bstan tam/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ snang ba'i lha rnams
63a7: bstan tam/ chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam/ tsha
63a8: med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams
63b1: pabastan tam/ mi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan tam gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'og min gyi lha rnams bstan tam/
63b2: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
63b3: min skye mched kyi lha gzugs med pa rnams bstan tam/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po bstan tam/ byang chub
63b4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du
63b5: phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa
63b6: dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas
63b7: stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
63b8: la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po
64a1: med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag/
64a2: par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags
64a3: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis
64a4: pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug pa yongs su
64a5: rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par
64a6: byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang sems
64a7: can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang / spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin
64a8: gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
64b1: yongs su sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag bstan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na/ de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul
64b2: can dag 'odi snyam sems te kyem mi 'dis lags par bslabs pa mtshar cha'i ri mdzes dge byed/ de kar skye ba dga' bar byed cing / gzugs kyi bye brag snga chags 'dis ste/ glang po gzugs dang /
64b3: rta'i gzugs dang / ba lang gi gzugs dang / rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs dang / skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs ston pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / dka'
64b4: thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga'i ra ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / rdzing bu mdadas dga' ba ston pa dang / nags tshal mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang /
64b5: gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu ston pa dang / glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing / sbyin pa
64b6: yongs su bting ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pas sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba dang / shes rab sgrim pa dang / rnam pa 'di dag gis skye bo dga'
64b7: bar byed cing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / khyim bdag cha zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / ri rab ston pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
64b8: lha rnams ston pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
65a1: byed kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
65a2: ston pa dang / snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung snang gi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /
65a3: chung dge'i lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung che'i lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams
65a4: ston pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
65a5: ston pa dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched
65a6: kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / gzugs med pa'i lha rnams ston pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnams ston pa dang / lan cig phyir
65a7: 'ang ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po rnams ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
65a8: sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan
65b1: gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / byi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid song ba nyid
65b2: la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod//
65b3: ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
65b4: stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong po nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
65b5: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub
65b6: kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs
65b7: su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa
65b8: drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
66a1: dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par grub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par che ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
66a2: rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang / dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /
66a3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
66a4: yongs su sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ston pa ni
66a5: ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to/ / de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba dang ldan pa dpyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/ me
66a6: 'di da ltar med pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/ sems can 'di dag ni dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar de dag gi
66a7: shes pa 'byung ngo / / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings su sa gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma mthong ste/
66a8: thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / sems can du mi dmigs/ sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang srin
66b1: ba la yang dag par skal ba yin/ sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang tshul
66b2: khrims spang ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod
66b3: cing 'thun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bzod pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bzod pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag
66b4: gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems
66b5: can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul
66b6: ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rab
66b7: sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar
66b8: spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la legs pa rjod pa
67a1: yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan
67a2: pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gyi legs brjod pa yin/ sems
67a3: can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin
67a4: pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa
67a5: de dag gi legs brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ sems can gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba
67a6: yin/ bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bas
67a7: gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'i legs brjed pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam
67a8: gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan
67b1: gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs brjod cing
67b2: 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa
67b3: rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/
67b4: gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod
67b5: pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de
67b6: ngag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dga' ba'i legs brjod pa yin/
67b7: sems can gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang btang
67b8: snyoms la yang dag par skul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin//
68a1: bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas sgyu mchad la snyams par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang namamakha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul pa yin/ rnam mkha' mtha' masas
68a2: mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spong ba yin/ bdag kyang rnam
68a3: shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/
68a4: sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la sems
68a5: par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang cung zad med po'i skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang cung zad med pa'i skye mched
68a6: la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod ci ngo 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes mod 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes
68a7: med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang dag par skul pa yin/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
68a8: la snyoms par 'jug po de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag
68b1: par skul ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar
68b2: stong pa yin/ bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa/
68b3: yin/ sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
68b4: rdza 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa rjed pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa
68b5: rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skal ba yin/ dbang po rnams kyi legs pa rjed pa yin/ sems
68b6: can gzhan gang dbang po rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang stobs rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba
68b7: yin/ stobs rnams kyi legs brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang stobs rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag
68b8: rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs parjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan
69a1: lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam
69a2: yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi
69a3: legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i
69a4: sgo gsum gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad
69a5: sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa de
69a6: dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
69a7: dgul yang dag par skul ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i legs parjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom par
69a8: dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i
69b1: legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par
69b2: 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin
69b3: la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par
69b4: skul ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang
69b5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa rjod pa yin//
69b6: sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mi 'jigs
69b7: pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
69b8: bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems
70a1: ca ga' dgangs pa yang dag par rag pa bzhi sgom pa dag ga lags brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams band snyad pa yan/ gzhan
70a2: byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa chen po'i legs parjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po sgom pa de dag gi legs brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar
70a3: spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje chen po'i legs brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje chen po sgom pa
70a4: de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la yang
70a5: dag par skul ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi legs brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod
70a6: cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mi
70a7: chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
70a8: bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang dang byad bzang po brgyad bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu'i legs parjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan
70b1: gang dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam/ bar du
70b2: yang de bzhin du ma yin du zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi
70b3: 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du
70b4: bar du yang de bzhin pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings
70b5: ston to/ / sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol
70b6: du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i lo'u ste drug bcu bzhi'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya brgyad bcu bzhi pa/ de nas tshe dang
70b7: ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te sems can yang shin du dmigs su ma mchis la sems can du dmigs pa yang ma mchis na/ su
70b8: don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
71a1: 'byod byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pon yang dag pa' maba' chang mar byas kyang / shes rabakya pa ram du phyin pa rnam/ rab 'byor gas te yang dag pa ma
71a2: gzhan la sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
71a3: ma yin/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom ste/ shes
71a4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan
71a5: 'das gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan
71a6: 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni/ des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis na/
71a7: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/
71a8: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba yang med/ rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba yang med na/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems/
71b1: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe
71b2: na/ / sems can gyi mtha' gzhan ma yin yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar na sems can gyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// gsol pa/
71b3: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang yang
71b4: dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
71b5: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do// sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha
71b6: dang dbus ston te/ ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang stong tha ma'i mtha' yang stong / dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang stong / sbyin bdag kyang stong / len pa yang stong par ston cing / rigs kyi bu de
71b7: ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag med kyis/ sbyin pa yang gzhan la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du mi sems shig/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la len pa yang gzhan no snyam du mi sems shig/ rigs kyi
71b8: bu khyod nam sbyin pa yang gzhan la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du mi sems/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la len pa yang gzhan no snyam du mi sems pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud rtsi dang bdud rtsi'i
72a1: 'bras bu dang mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te/ sbyin pa 'dis gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen
72a2: 'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pas steng ngo / / de'i 'bras bu yang 'bras bus stong ngo // sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin pa dag gis stong ngo // len pa yang len pas stong ste/ stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa mi dmigs sbyin pa'i
72a3: 'bras bu dang sbyin pa dag dang len pa mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shin du stong ngo zhes rjod do// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
72a4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la 'god de/ tshur rigs kyi bu srog gcod pa spongs la/ srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ ma byin
72a5: par len pa spongs la ma byin par len pa las phyir ldog pa'i byis shig/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spongs la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ brdzun du smra ba spongs la brdzun du
72a6: smra ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ phra ma spongs la phra ma las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig spongs la zhe gcod pa'i tshig las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ tshig kyal ba spongs la tshig kyal
72a7: ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ chags sems spongs la chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ gnod sems spongs la gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ log par lta ba spongs la log
72a8: bar lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyis rigs kyi bu sems tang gang gi srog gcod par bya ba'i srog chags
72b1: dang / gang gis srog gcod par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang ma byin par blang ba dang / ma byin par len par btags pa dang / gang gis blang ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang 'dod pas/
72b2: log par g.yem pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem par btags pa dang / gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang brdzun du smra ba dang / brdzun du smra bar
72b3: btags pa dang / gang gis brdzun du smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang phra ma smra ba dang / phra mar smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis phra mar smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang zhe
72b4: gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / zhe gcod par btags pa dang / gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig su smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang tshig kyal ba smra ba dang / tshig kyal bar btags pa dang / gang gis
72b5: tshig kyal bar sla ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang chags sems bskyed pa dang / chags sems su btags pa dang / gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang
72b6: gnod sems skyed pa dang / gnod sems su btags pa dang / gang gis gnod sems su bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang log par lta ba dang log par lta bar btags pa dang / gang gis
72b7: log par lta ba mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston cing / tshul khrims sa 'god de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas shes rab
72b8: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yogs su smin par byed do// des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de yang
73a1: ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas/ rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas/ de la mngon par zhen par mi byed do// mngon par zhen pa med pas
73a2: 'khrug par mi 'gyur cing shes rab skyed do/ / shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de yang 'jig
73a3: rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam pa ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ de'i mya ngan las 'das pa
73a4: zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can phan tshun gnod par sems
73a5: shing 'khrugs par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na/ 'di skad du 'dems shing ston te/ rigs kyi bu bzod pas bsgrubs shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ nges pa dang sems zhi ba dang dang du sems pa'i ngang tshul can du
73a6: gyis shig/ gang gis gcod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba dang / gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni su yod/
73a7: gnod par ni sul bya/ cis ni gnod par bya sems dang / chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs/
73a8: pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas so// nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so// lha rnams kyis ma byas so// klu rnams kyis ma byas so//
73b1: gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so// bri ba rnams kyis ma byas so// lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas so// nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so// mi 'am ci rnams kyis ma byas so// lto 'phye chen po rnams
73b2: kyis mo byas so/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so// sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / dge rgyas
73b3: dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis
73b4: ma byas te/ de ni rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o// rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni su la yang gnod par mi byed do zhes nas/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
