210b3: bzod pa'i rkyen te ma/ gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas bsgrub par byas/ brtson 'grus rtsom shig ces nas/ sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
210b4: dpa' chen po'i yo byad la spyod cing / / lus sam sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa'i
210b5: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/ / de dag bsgoms pas rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob po// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob po// dgra bcom pa nyid
210b6: 'thob bo/ / rang byang chub 'thob bo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsol lo
210b7: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/ / brtson 'grus kyi legs brjod do// sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do// de ltar
210b8: bya chub chags dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing / brtson 'grus pa rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zla ste/ rab
211a1: 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su spyod pa yin no//
211a2: rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
211a3: dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ 'di skad du sems can byed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par mi gnad ces rjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro//
211a4: zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la 'di skad tu 'dems te/ kye sems can dgangs rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'i
211a5: bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas/ rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar
211a6: sgrub ste/ de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/
211a7: bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go// byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go// snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go// dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go// btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jugagazugs med pa
211a8: snyoms der 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go/ de dag gi bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa
211b1: ba'i sgom mo/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// dbang po lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/
211b2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo// de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de la la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs
211b3: su mi nyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su spyad pa yin no// rab 'byor ji
211b4: ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa
211b5: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ 'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab mi sgom zhes rjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan
211b6: pa'i phyir ro sa zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la 'di skad tu 'dems te/ de las yo byad rnams long la/ sbyin pa byin
211b7: cig/ tshul khrims sung shig/ bzod pa sgom shig/ brtson 'grus rtsom shig/ ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig/ rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa
211b8: la/ bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ 'gro ba 'am/ gso' ba 'am/ skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shed can nam/ shed bdag gam/ byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba po 'am/ shes pa po'am/ mthong ba po
212a1: 'am/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams sam/ gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams sam/ sbyin pa'i
212a2: pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/
212a3: nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/
212a4: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/
212a5: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams/
212a6: sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/
212a7: bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par
212a8: thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
212b1: sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig/
212b2: phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'am/ chos gang yang yod
212b3: ngam/ rtog shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la dmigs pas mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i
212b4: chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ de la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su
212b5: ma mthong bas/ 'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o// 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni mi'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang
212b6: ldan pa'o/ / 'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no// 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems
212b7: dpa'o/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
212b8: du phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas
213a1: shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad
213a2: de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
213a3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i ba
213a4: rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo
213a5: byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
213a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems
213a7: dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo
213a8: byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/
213b1: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
213b2: sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams
213b3: nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po rnams lnga sgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
213b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
213b5: ba la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs
213b6: su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/ / stobs rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du
213b7: byin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag
213b8: bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can
214a1: rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/ / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thang bar 'gyur// rab 'byor da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
214a2: dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du
214a3: byin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar
214a4: smra ba ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar
214a5: 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor/
214a6: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
214a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
214a8: bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
214b1: bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhil sems can rnams
214b2: sbyor ba yin zhe no/ / rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong
214b3: ba bzhi sgom mo/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su zar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
214b4: gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi
214b5: rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems
214b6: can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
214b7: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
214b8: gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub te/ yo byad de dag gis yongs
215a1: su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo/ / dbang po lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
215a2: po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la/
215a3: gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub te/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i
215a4: sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/ / stobs lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
215a5: gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
215a6: sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams
215a7: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/ / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi
215a8: rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing //
215b1: 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa la sems cad rnams myor ba yid zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo dmas nye bar stongs te/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i
215b2: sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215b3: chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
215b4: pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis
215b5: yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
215b6: dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas
215b7: shing yang dag par spong ba ba zhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ / rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar smrab ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin
215b8: pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod par
216a1: pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams stor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas
216a2: shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhil sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin
216a3: pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
216a4: pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang
216a5: po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams
216a6: dbang po lnga sgom mo/ / dbang po lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga
216a7: la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la/
216a8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dgal yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga bsgoms pas 'khor
216b1: ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lngal sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
216b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyong bayin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
216b3: dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/
216b4: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
216b5: sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
216b6: dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba
216b7: las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no//
216b8: rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
217a1: sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar
217a2: gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar
217a3: gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems
217a4: can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams/ yang
217a5: dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
217a6: du phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas
217a7: shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis
217a8: yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
217b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
217b2: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/
217b3: yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
217b4: po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas
217b5: shing stobs lngal sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems
217b6: can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/ / stobs lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
217b7: gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
217b8: sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams
218a1: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/ / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
218a2: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin
218a3: pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/
218a4: yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/
218a5: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar
218a6: na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
218a7: sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas
218a8: 'khor ba las yongs su zar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhil sems
218b1: can rnams sbyor ba yin no/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab
218b2: 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par
218b3: spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la
218b4: sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe
218b5: na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi
218b6: rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems
