242b3: skam du sa pas te// pal bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan dang po la dgod do// mal bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la ma
242b4: nga gzhag go/ / sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gsub pa

242b8: bdag nyid kyis kyang dam ma'a'amatha' las skye bached la mnyam par gzhag go/ / sems can thams cad kyang rnamamakha' maba' pas sa cad la dgang nga// mal bdag nyid kyis kyang rnam shes sa
243a1: yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ sems can thams cad kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la mnyam
243a2: par gzhag go/ sems can thams cad kyang chung zad med pa'i skye mched la dgod do// mal bdag nyid kyis kyang 'du shes med 'dra shes med min skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ sems can thams
243a3: cad kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la dgod do/ / ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la
243a4: dgod do/ / ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

243a7: thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la dgod do/ / ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag bcwa
243a8: pa la dgod do/ / ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i/ stong pa nyid
243b1: dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dgod do snyam ste/ de de ltar sems dpa'i tshe/ de snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pas sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
243b2: de'i sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang mi bral ba dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang ma 'bral ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang /
243b3: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag dang mi bral bar shog shig ces bya bar sems skyed do// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
243b4: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ de nas bsam pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
243b5: rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ste/ de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa yin// sems can de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par byed pa
243b6: yin te/ de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang mdzes pa yin/ sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir
243b7: gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par 'grub ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed de/ ci nas kyang ngan song gsum
243b8: du gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / lta ba rnam par gdags pa'i mide yang mi srid pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug tu gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / bud med dang / skyes par gdags pa'i
244a1: ming yang mi srid pa dang / thog pa gnyis su gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par gdags pa
244a2: ming yang mi srid pa dang / bdag dang bdag gir bya bar gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang bar gdags pa'i mid yang mi srid pa dang / phyin ci log tu gdags pa'i ming yang mi
244a3: srid pa dang / 'bras bur gdags pa'i med yang mi srid cing / gzhan du na sems can de dag 'dod pa bzhin du/ shing rlung gis btab pa 'am/ phyi nang gi dngos po dag las 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan
244a4: ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / mi skye mi 'gag pa'i sgra dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra dang / chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / tshe tsha dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba
244a5: bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo // gang stong pa de la ni mtshan
244a6: ma med do/ / gang la mtshan ma med pa de la ni smon pa med do zhes bya bar chos bstan pa'i sgra nyid mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro yang rung 'dug kyang rung / sdod kyang rung nyal yang rung ste/ rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
244a7: lta bur sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su spyod do/ / de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
244a8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de thams cad legs par rjod par 'gyur te/
244b1: sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
244b2: sangs rgyas des chos bstan na/ sems can gang yang 'di ni chos so// 'di ni chos ma yin no zhes bya bar the tsom za bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni/ chos ma
244b3: yin pa gang yang med de/ thams cad kyang chos so// de la sems can gang mi dge ba'i rtsa bas non pa dang / sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa mi dge ba'i bshes ga gnyen gyis
244b4: yongs su zin pa bdag tu lta bar bying ba nas/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du byir brtag pa 'am/ chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa log par 'dzin pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni yang
244b5: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par 'du shes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa de dag ni chos ma yin pa la yang chos so zhes zer
244b6: chos la yang chos ma yin no zhes zer te/ de dag chos la spong bar 'gyur te/ de ltar chos spangs nas/ lus zhig pa'i 'og tu shi nas/ ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par lhung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar
244b7: 'gyur te/ de lta bu dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing / 'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag sdig par lta ba'i
244b8: rnam pa de dag las rnam par 'grol te/ de ltar rnam par bkrol nas nges pa'i phung por rab tu 'god de/ der bkod pa'i rnams byin cing ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
245a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/ de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam/
245a2: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam/ bag pa med pa'i chos sam/ 'dus byas kyi chos sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang gnas par mi 'gyur to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar
245a3: nges par 'gyur ro/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ la 'a drug bcu bdun no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
245a4: 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes bgyi ba 'am/ ma des shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/
245a5: mnges pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ nyan thos kyi phung po 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ phung po gang du nges pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
245a6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung por nges pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi pa
245a7: por nges pa'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes bgyi'am/ 'on tam phyir mi ldog pa res shes bgyi ba'am/ 'on tam srang
245a8: pa tha ma des shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni das pa'o// phyir me ldog pa ni nges pa'o// srid pa
245b1: garig gas chags pa ni nges pa'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
245b2: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ rabo 'byor nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du mi skye'o// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ brgyad pa 'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/
245b3: cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir pi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
245b4: 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pas sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom
245b5: pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i don du gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas med do// lha tshe ringos por skye ba'i
245b6: gnas med do/ / gang na dge ba'i chos rnams mi spyod pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas med do// glen pa dang lpags par 'gyur ba'i yul du skye ba'i gnas med do// mtha' 'khob kyi sa klo dang / mi srun cing / 'khor bani rlur med
245b7: ba'i bral bas pa'i gnas med do/ / log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas med do// gang na sangs rgyas kyi blam zag pa dang / chos kyi skam grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bur smra ba'i gnas med de/
245b8: bya ba ma yin pa'i lta bar ltung ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam
246a1: pas yang dag par zhugs pa ni/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/
246a2: ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i gnas su mi skye ba lags na/ gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song gi chung du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na/ de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis/ bcom
246a3: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi dge ba'i las kyis byol song gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gyi/ lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur bar
246a4: dang / de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing / sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su 'dzin kyang / rab 'byor de ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing /
246a5: de la la la zhig gsong du 'ongs kyang / bla na med pa'i bzod pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing / sems can de dag la gnod par mi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dag dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam/
246a6: rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs nges kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par
246a7: byed cing / byol song gi skye gnas su skye yang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes pas mi gos par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing / byang rgab sems dpa' sems
246a8: dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang yod/ da
246b1: dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang
246b2: chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba med do/ / dge ba'i chos gang yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
246b3: 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad
246b4: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya ste/ de la bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob po// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
246b5: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngan song ngam/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
246b6: sbal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa zag pa med pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags/ bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags shing //
246b7: zag pa mi mnga' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing de mngon par skal
246b8: nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam med/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor des de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas
247a1: par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi sa gnas kyi sdug bsngar myong
247a2: bar 'gyur ra pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bu ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos
247a3: zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/ lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do// rab 'byor de ji snyam du
247a4: sems/ dgra bco pas sprul pa mngon par sprul na/ sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing / las des gzhan gyi dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
247a5: de de bzhin te mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing /
247a6: delta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/ ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du yang mi 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal gyi cha re ba yang nyams su bkod de//
247a7: rab 'byor da ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sbrum las glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs shig bstan tam/ gzhan ya skam rnam pa sna tshogs bstan na// de dag ga
247a8: po'i gzugs sapa/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs sam/ srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
247b1: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched dubs pas shing / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin ta/ lus de dag gis sa
247b2: can rnams kyi don byed de/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes
247b3: zag pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar ldan zhing lus gang dang ngag gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni thabs shin du mkhas pa ste/ de na ngo mtshar che'o// bcom
247b4: ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing / de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang las de lta bus mi gos par spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
247b5: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de/ thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i
247b6: phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la 'di ltar byang chub sems
247b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang / gang gis reg par bya ba dang / gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos
247b8: gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la reg par mi byed do/ / stong pa nyid kyis chos gang la yang reg par mi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya' ma yin no// de
248a1: ca'abyor zhe/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// den po dmigs pa stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan med pa yang dag
248a2: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la mi gnas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
248a3: 'bra' shig la gnas shing rnam pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i khongs su mchud pa de lta du
248a4: yod ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khongs su chos thams cad 'du ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyang
248a5: pa nyid la ni chos gang yang khongs su chud pa 'am/ khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis mi stong ngam/ gso
248a6: pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ste chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du yang 'das sa pa/ gsol pa/ bcom
248a7: ldan 'das deng lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ram grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha ro lang phyi pa la grangs
248a8: shing / de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
248b1: shes rab tu pha rol du phyin pa la stod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas ste/ mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu ma'i
248b2: pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de dgon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / chos nyan cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
248b3: la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di ska/ ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor
248b4: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga' klung gi bye ma snying po deng// thams cad ngo ba tod kyis stong pa mthong
248b5: ngo/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo // gzhan du na ming dang brdar gdags pa nye bar bzla shing /
248b6: bstan pa ma gtogs te/ grangags pa kur kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // gal te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong ste gangags pa'i drung
248b7: de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong pa zhig yin de ni nyi tso ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de yang stong pa nyi tse ba ma yin no// de'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sa ba
248b8: dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing / lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang /
249a1: 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang / shi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na
249a2: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma dus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub tu mngon par shes pa'i pha rol
249a3: du phyin par 'dus te/ mngon por shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de tshol ba'i tshe lha'i mag rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong /
249a4: gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/ dge pa'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid ni gang la mngon
249a5: par zhen cing / ro myong bar byed par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de stong pa nyid ni ro myong bar byed pa med do// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyis brgya dgu bcu drug pa// de ltar byang chub
249a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/ lha'i mig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ de chos de dag la gnas shed las
249a7: mngon par bsgrub bo/ / las mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sems can nam sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do// de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems
249a8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes pas bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed do// de lta'i mig rnam par dag pa
249b1: las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan napa/ shes
249b2: rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam// 'phags
249b3: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
249b4: par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/
249b5: 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i
249b6: chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa
249b7: byin cig phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan
249b8: yang bde bar gyes shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nyid gnyid gas zos te/ ngan song gsum las mthar bar gyur te regs chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang rje
250a1: snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste// tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/
250a2: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam// gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi
250a3: nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan
250a4: tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur/
250a5: ste/ de lta bas na byed pa na tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas ni khyed kyis
250a6: 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lon
250a7: sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le la'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
250a8: yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa
250b1: can du rdu tu shes chos ston to/ / sems can sems g.yengs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yed pa ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par
250b2: pa ni sems chen dpral ba 'am byol song gas gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ldang na/ bdag ris kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos bya
250b3: de'i phyir khyed kyis gsang pa' sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rapa'atshal pa can gang ji snang ba de dag la 'di skad du ros
250b4: ston te/ / kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal bas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ de ltar na shes rab 'amal pa'i rnam par smin pa na
250b5: sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur tar
250b6: zhes chos ston to/ / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa dag rten cing 'brel
250b7: 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ / lam ngan par zhugs pa la spyod pa dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyar zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos stonate/
250b8: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston te/
251a1: 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig
251a2: rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan
251a3: nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam
251a4: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
251a5: par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa
251a6: rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs
251a7: rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba
251a8: ste/ bongs pas ni bdag gi da kyang bya bar mi rus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci spos kyis/ de ltar byed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non cing
251b1: nyid ga nyeng gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur te re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stor te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul thams ngan pa ni sngag bsngal
251b2: pa ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi num na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sar/ gshin
251b3: rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar ngan song gsum du ldang na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par ma nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi ge
251b4: skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji rnyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems
251b5: su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed pan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas/
251b6: su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jog rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can la
251b7: lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi rus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems
251b8: can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshi ni rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir
252a1: khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / byis 'gyod pa can du gyur te de zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
252a2: kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum
252a3: du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos
252a4: ston to/ / sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/
252a5: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas mam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i
252a6: sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji
252a7: snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ / gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/
252a8: nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ byed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis
252b1: stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nub te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
252b2: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig
252b3: rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa
252b4: nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phag pa
252b5: pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i
252b6: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
252b7: sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams pa pa/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos pam/ byang
252b8: chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
253a1: du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la
253a2: bdag cag kyang bde bar bgyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nyid sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems
253a3: can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrim pa ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan
253a4: gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/
253a5: bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te
253a6: re zhes chos ston to/ / sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su mi byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par
253a7: gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i
253a8: 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can ga
253b1: ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems
253b2: can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/
253b3: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// byes 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
253b4: kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song
253b5: gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re
253b6: zhes chos ston to/ / sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya/
253b7: bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab
253b8: 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can
254a1: gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ / gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/
254a2: nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo
254a3: nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
254a4: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig
254a5: rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar
254a6: gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
254a7: la ma yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i
254a8: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
254b1: sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos
254b2: sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs
254b3: pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/
254b4: phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nyid sha nyid gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to/
254b5: kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems
254b6: can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i
254b7: phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / byis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de
254b8: ngag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod pa sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun du sems
255a1: 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam
255a2: gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / byis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta ro zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le le ni sdug bsngal ba// le los ni bdag
255a3: gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du
255a4: lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//
255a5: sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/
255a6: byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems
255a7: 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab
255a8: 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal bas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye
255b1: gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa
255b2: tsan gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam
255b3: ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed
255b4: chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos
255b5: ston to/ / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don
255b6: byed pa yin no/ / de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa
255b7: 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab pa ma/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
255b8: rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
256a1: pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam
256a2: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
256a3: pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la
256a4: sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de
256a5: ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan sor gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes
256a6: chos ston to/ / sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya
256a7: bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song
256a8: gsum du lhungar na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis// de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can
256b1: du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ / sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par
256b2: gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
256b3: skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas ni khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
256b4: du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas
256b5: sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhad na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs
256b6: kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang
256b7: sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyer ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus
256b8: na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'go' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'aral
257a1: pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don/
257a2: spros te/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyud kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam
257a3: gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// na snga dge spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la
257a4: sbyor ro/ / gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lom ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang
257a5: sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
257a6: chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
257a7: spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lta'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ shar wA'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
257a8: rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa
257b1: bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spyod pa rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam
257b2: yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
257b3: pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs
257b4: pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/
257b5: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni
257b6: sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig
257b7: phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nyid sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos
257b8: ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni
258a1: sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/
258a2: de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag
258a3: la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun du sems
258a4: 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ ngo bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi
258a5: go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod po can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed po de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los
258a6: ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed
258a7: ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du
258a8: gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ / sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yong ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems
258b1: can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng
258b2: ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / byis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'tshal/
258b3: ba ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol seng gi skye gnas sam/ gshin
258b4: rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa
258b5: la sbyor ro/ / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag
258b6: pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid
258b7: kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
258b8: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don de ltar byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho nub kyi phyogs
259a1: mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab
259a2: bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags
259a3: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i
259a4: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi
259a5: 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos
259a6: sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin
259a7: cig phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde
259a8: bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nyid sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur te re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
259b1: du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste// tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems
259b2: can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yani te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir/
259b3: khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di
259b4: skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyad gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par
259b5: gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyang / de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi
259b6: dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi
259b7: nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngani song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag
259b8: kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems
260a1: g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi
260a2: skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci spos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi
260a3: ge skabs kyang me bye'o/ / byas 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'tshal ba can gang ji skyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug
260a4: bsngal te/ shes rab 'thal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi donag/ ci smos te/ ga shes rab 'tshal po'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'om// bye mas dgas gnas sapa/ sa/
260a5: rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'a jal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi goskabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te shes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji sad pa
260a6: de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji skad pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa
260a7: gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lama'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi la ma'am/ sangs rgyas kyil ba la stor shing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye khyed chos gang la mngo/
260a8: par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab
260b1: 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lta'i
260b2: mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'dis pa de nyid kyis/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa
260b3: 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab ba ma/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag paraspong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs
260b4: rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam
260b5: tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin
260b6: gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
260b7: sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs zas kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston
260b8: te/ sbyin pa byan cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang
261a1: bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nyid sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag
261a2: la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni
261a3: sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir
261a4: khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du
261a5: chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na sems
261a6: can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa
261a7: can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ / sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don
261a8: lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/
261b1: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la
261b2: 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song ge skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de
261b3: ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur
261b4: ta re zhes chos ston to/ / sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gdon kyang bya bar mi
261b5: nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol gsong gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems
261b6: 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyes 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa
261b7: de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ / gte mug go spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji sbeng pa de dag la yang dag pa lal la g+ho / nyan thos kyilam
261b8: 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong s+ho// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa
262a1: chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
262a2: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lta'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ 'og ga phyogs kyi
262a3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar
262a4: gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
262a5: lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
262a6: rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
262a7: sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas
262a8: kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug
262b1: bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lnga ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas
262b2: zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes
262b3: bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal
262b4: ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul
262b5: khams ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston
262b6: te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na sems can
262b7: dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod
262b8: bcan du gyur ti nas chos son to/ / sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di thad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo na sdug bsngal ba ste/ le lo sa ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/
263a1: gzhan gyi ngan la kyi thos te/ le lo rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi sgra gnas sam/ gshin rdzo 'jug tan yan te/ de ltar byed nga song gsum du ldang na/ bdag ma/
263a2: kyang gdon par mi dus ma/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de 'phrer khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam kyog nabs kyang mi dbye'o// byas 'gyod pa can du gyur ta nas chos san te// sems can sams
263a3: g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/
263a4: gshin rnga'i 'jig nyid yin te/ de ltar lded ngan song gsum du lung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par / ci smos kyis/ de byur byed kyis gse pa sems 'ga' tsam sdi gsabs kyang mi
263a5: dbye'o/ / byis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab
263a6: 'chal bas ni bdag gdon kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don la ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/
263a7: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//
263a8: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i
263b1: lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi pha ma 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos stod te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid
263b2: kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
263b3: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
263b4: bam po nyis brgya dgu bcu bdun pa/ de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa'i me las 'das pa de nyid kyis// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song shing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul
263b5: khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams
263b6: sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan
263b7: rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/
263b8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam// mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
264a1: sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs byas bya chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byang cang / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
264a2: du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/
264a3: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
264a4: du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba
264a5: 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i
264a6: sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis ba'agyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la
264a7: gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol
264a8: song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// byis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta ro zhes chos ston to//
264b1: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo na sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin
264b2: pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis
264b3: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes tshes ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes
264b4: bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byel song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song
264b5: gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes
264b6: chos ston to/ / sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya/
264b7: bar mi rus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes
264b8: rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod
265a1: pa can gang ji snad ba de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro/ / gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngon par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang da/
265a2: pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo'inyi da kyis
265a3: stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus ste/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhes pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
265a4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par shes pa rnams la ma
265a5: gnas pas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus te/ lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzung bar mi nus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bya med pa ma med pas ni nam mkha' las
265a6: 'gro bar mi nus so/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par sems can rnams la chos ston par mi nus so// rab 'byor de lta bas na
265a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis sems
265a8: can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do/ / des lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //
265b1: de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/
265b2: brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis lho phyogs kyi 'ji/
265b3: rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig/ skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems
265b4: sems kyis khong du chud par byas na/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gauta ma 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab
265b5: kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag
265b6: tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / / de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis kho du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i
265b7: gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/
265b8: 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //
266a1: de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod
266a2: pa'i gtama'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis byang shar/
266a3: gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu yang zhing / sems can de dag gi
266a4: sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi
266a5: gtama'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag du
266a6: sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / / de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i
266a7: gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyo gtama'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gau ta ma'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'bags pa'i bded pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i
266a8: gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ / des lha'i mig gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ba snyed 'thong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji skad cig rgyas pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de
266b1: ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/
266b2: brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis nub byang gi
266b3: phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems
266b4: can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi
266b5: gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis steng 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
