312a2: nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lu'i 'dus te ga pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de'i
312a3: stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
312a4: ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa
312a5: de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
312a6: yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin
312a7: pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ me'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
312a8: stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
312b1: ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong panyid pa yin nam/ rnam dang drug gams nyid gang yin pa de nyid snang ba nyid ma yin
312b2: nam/ reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ len pa'i chos nyid gang
312b3: yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rga shi'i chos nyad gang yin pa de nyid stong ba nyid ma yin nam/ sbyin
312b4: pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin na gatshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin napa/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson
312b5: 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
312b6: stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
312b7: yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
312b8: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
313a1: nas pananas/ zag pa dang thas sa da bkang ba pata na byu nyid pa da pa/ dang ba bsnang ba sa na sa sa shA na 'a dug
313a2: stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
313a3: yin nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
313a4: pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
313a5: chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stobs rnams kyi
313a6: chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam
313a7: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
313a8: yin nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
313b1: par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes
313b2: pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// de bzhin
313b3: gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin
313b4: pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
313b5: 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ichos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/
313b6: nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
313b7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/
313b8: nag phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems//
314a1: dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan
314a2: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi
314a3: mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/ dri'i mtshan nyid dam/
314a4: ro'i mtshan nyid dam/ reg gi mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i rnam par
314a5: shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg
314a6: pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus
314a7: te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam
314a8: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan
314b1: nying dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched drug ge pa tshad nyid dang/
314b2: reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ len pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i
314b3: mtshan nyid dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid
314b4: dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chen po stong pa
314b5: nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ thog ma dang /
314b6: tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rangag mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
314b7: dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
314b8: kye mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par song ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan
315a1: nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/
315a2: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rngam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
315a3: dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi chos nyid dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
315a4: rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mo 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/
315a5: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dam/ lam gyi
315a6: rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa'i
315a7: mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs
315a8: sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la yang so so'i
315b1: skye bo med/ so so'i skye bo las gud na yang de med/ de la yang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yang med/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na yang de med/ de la yang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yang med/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang
315b2: las gud na yang de med/ de la yang brgyad pa med/ brgyad pa las gud na yang de med de la yang rgyan du zhugs pa med/ rgyun du zhugs pa las gud na yang de med/ de la yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud
315b3: na yang de med/ de la yang phyir mi 'ong ba med/ phyir mi 'ong ba las gud na yang de med/ de la yang dgra bcom pa med/ dgra bcom pa las gud na yang de med/ de la yang rang sangs rgyas med/ rang sangs rgyas las gud na yang de
315b4: med/ de la yang byang chub sems dpa' med/ byang chub sems dpa' las gud na yang de med/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa med/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na yang de med par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/
315b5: chos nyid de 'dus bgyis ba lags sam/ 'dus ma bgyis ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te/ 'dus byas las gud na yang 'dus ma byas dmigs
315b6: su med do/ / 'dus ma byas las gud na yang 'dus byas dmigs su med de// rab 'byor de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang
315b7: ma yin te/ gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o// de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi don dam par ma yin te/ don dam pa la lus
315b8: kyi 'du byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed med de lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na yang don dam pa dmigs su med do// 'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi
316a1: mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/
316a2: yang byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun bcu gcig go// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos
316a3: thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de'i slad du chos gang la yang gang yang ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis na/ de ltar chos thams cad ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis shing / ci yang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang chu
316a4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyi ba dang / don 'thun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa
316a5: lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gang la yang ci yang byed pa yang med/ ci yang mi byed pa yang med de/ gal te
316a6: sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni/ de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ba la sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / bdag gi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis
316a7: 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sems can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srog gi 'du
316a8: shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar
316b1: byed cing / gso ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /
316b2: gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gang zag gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas
316b3: stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar
316b4: byed cing / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel
316b5: ba dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang
316b6: bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral
316b7: bar byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /
316b8: 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'dushes
317a1: dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mig gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing/ mig gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rna ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar
317a2: byed cing / rna ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'du shes dang
317a3: bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang
317a4: yid kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyi
317a5: 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sgra'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sgra'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / dri'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / dri'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid
317a6: kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / ro'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ro'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / reg gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / reg gi 'du shes dang bral nas stong
317a7: pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chos kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chos kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig/
317a8: gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor
317b1: b.las 'grel ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing
317b2: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las/
317b3: 'grel ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed
317b4: cing / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis
317b5: 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral
317b6: bar byed cing lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis
317b7: 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
317b8: tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed
318a1: cang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te
318a2: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes
318a3: dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis
318a4: 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sa'i khams
318a5: kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid
318a6: kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rlung
318a7: ge khams kyi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
318a8: pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ma rig
318b1: pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i
318b2: 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong
318b3: pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / reg pa'i 'dugs dang bral bar byed cing /
318b4: reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sred pa'i 'dushes dang
318b5: bral bar byed cing / sred pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / len pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / len pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / srid
318b6: pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srid pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /
318b7: rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rga shi'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/
318b8: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa yin yang / 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
319a1: bka' stsal pa/ 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
319a2: de ni ma lags so/ / sprul ba de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis so// stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma lags/ mi ldan
319a3: pa yang ma lags te/ de gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/ de tsa'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid do/ 'di sprul pa'ogs kyi bar rnam par bcab pa mdzad/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ da ni 'di lta ste stong pa nyid dang / sprul pa
319a4: gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa gang sprul pa ma yin pade
319a5: lA bu yod dam/ gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul ba lags kyang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
319a6: babazhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stabs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par zar pa'i sgogasum dang / 'phags pa'i bdan pa pan
319a7: dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnams par 'jug pa dgra dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / drabazhin gzhags pa'i stobs bcu dang /
319a8: 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / de dag gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zag rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig
319b1: phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes gang zag rnam par dgod pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul
319b2: ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/ de la la la ni nyan thos kyis sprul pa'o// la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o// la la ni byang chub
319b3: sems dpas sprul pa'o/ / la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o// la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o// la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni sprul pa'o//
319b4: gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
319b5: 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bskyed pa 'am bkag pa'i chos
319b6: gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni sprul pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gang la skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa
319b7: yang med pa de ni ma sbal pa'o/ / gsal ba/ de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chos de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
319b8: kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ gnyis su yang mi dmigs te/ chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu med do zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las
320a1: 'das pa yang sprul par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan thos
320a2: kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas te
320a3: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'grol bar bgyi na
320a4: rngaltar ga mas shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gyi sngon dngos po yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po med par 'gyur bayod dam// rab 'byor 'di
320a5: dngos po yod pa yang med/ dngos po med pa yang med/ ngo bo nyid kyang med/ gzhan gyi dngos po yang med na/ de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba lta yod par
320a6: 'gyur rosnyan/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las chos nyid mi 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bdun bcu gnyis so//
320a7: me d+hamA tra ma b+had pacan te/ rdzun khrag kyab da// sa na tum pa rjod ma thas/ mtham pa smras pa// kug 'askyabs mad/ sratsa par ma du/ me du nagasas/
